item.title: Using SQL
item.description: Filtering columns through select and where query<-"SELECT playerID, teamID, yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE teamID='NYA' and yearID=1927" sqldf(query) playerID teamID yearID HR 1 beallwa01 NYA 1927 0 2 bengobe01 NYA 1927 0 3 collipa01 NYA 1927 7 4 combsea01 NYA 1927 6 5 duganjo01 NYA 1927 2 6 durstce01 NYA 1927 0 7 gazelmi01 NYA 1927 0 8 gehrilo01 NYA 1927 47 9 giardjo01 NYA 1927 0 10 grabojo01 NYA 1927 0 11 hoytwa01 NYA 1927 0 12 koenima01 NYA 1927 3 13 lazzeto01 NYA 1927 18 14 meusebo01 NYA 1927 8 15 moorewi01 NYA 1927 1 16 morehra01 NYA 1927 1 17 paschbe01 NYA 1927 2 18 pennohe01 NYA 1927 0 19 pipgrge01 NYA 1927 1 20 ruethdu01 NYA 1927 1 21 ruthba01 NYA 1927 60 22 shawkbo01 NYA 1927 0 23 shockur01 NYA 1927 0 24 thomamy01 NYA 1927 0 25 weraju01 NYA 1927 1 Getting stats for a team by typing WHERE =
